creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: lighter rendition: Christ seated on R side of round table with bread and wine; three men conversing with Christ at the same table; a man enters the scene at far L carrying a pitcher; woman at bottom embraces Christ’s ankle
marks:
Signature

in pencil on verso: P27 III | B 25 monogram in plate at lower left: [HSB]
title: Christ at the Table of Simon the Pharisee
